info.description: This is the API for the ExamSphere system
info.title: ExamSphere API

get.description: Allows a client (with Client-R-ID) to generate a captcha

post.description: Allows a user to get all participants of a course.

parameters.description: Data needed to get course participants
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows a user to create a new course.

parameters.description: Data needed to create a new course
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows a user to get all courses created by a user.

parameters.description: Data needed to get created courses
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows a user to edit a course.

parameters.description: Data needed to edit a course
parameters.name: data

get.description: Allows a user to get information about a course by its id.

post.description: Allows a user to search for courses by their name. Pass empty string to get all courses.

parameters.description: Data needed to search for courses
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows a user to get all courses participated by a user.

parameters.description: Data needed to get user courses
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to answer a question of an exam.
post.summary: Answer a question of an exam

parameters.description: Data needed to answer a question of an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to create a new exam.

parameters.description: Data needed to create a new exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to create a new question for an exam.
post.summary: Create a new question for an exam

parameters.description: Data needed to create a new question for an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to edit an exam.

parameters.description: Data needed to edit an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to edit a question of an exam.
post.summary: Edit a question of an exam

parameters.description: Data needed to edit a question of an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to get information about an exam that a user has participated in.
post.summary: Get information about an exam that a user has participated in

parameters.description: Data needed to get information about an exam that a user has participated in
parameters.name: data

get.description: Allows the user to get information about an exam.

post.description: Allows the user to get participants of an exam.

parameters.description: Data needed to get participants of an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to participate in an exam.

parameters.description: Data needed to participate in an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to get questions of an exam.

parameters.description: Data needed to get questions of an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to search exams.
Allows the user to set score for a user in an exam.
post.summary: Set score for a user in an exam

parameters.description: Data needed to set score for a user in an exam
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows the user to get history of exams of a user.
post.summary: Get history of exams of a user

parameters.description: Data needed to get history of exams of a user
parameters.name: data

get.description: Allows the user to get ongoing exams of a user.
get.summary: Get ongoing exams of a user

post.description: Create a new topic

parameters.description: Data needed to create a new topic
parameters.name: data

delete.description: Allows moderators to delete a topic. All courses and exams related to the topic will be deleted as well.

post.description: Search for topics

parameters.description: Data needed to search for topics
parameters.name: data

post.description: Get user topic stat

parameters.description: Data needed to get user topic stat
parameters.name: data

post.description: Allows a user to ban another user
Allows a user to change a user's password.
Allows a user to confirm their account
Allows a user to confirm changing their own's password (from redirected page)
Allows a user to create a new user
Allows a user to edit another user. Users are not allowed to edit their own information.

get.description: Allows a user to get another user's information by their user ID

post.description: Allows a user to login to the system and obtain access/refresh tokens

get.description: Allows a user to get their own information

post.description: Allows a user to refresh their access token
Allows a user to search for users

exam_id.description: ExamId is the exam the user is trying to participate in.

price.description: Price is the price of the exam that user has already paid.

user_id.description:
UserId is the user who is trying to participate in the exam.
If the user is trying to participate in the exam themselves,
this field should be set to their own user id.

exam_id.description: ExamId is the exam we are trying to give this score to.

score.description: Score is the score we are trying to give to the user.

user_id.description: UserId is the person we are trying to give this score to.

UserRole.description: UserRole is the role of the user.
